name: Maya & Baktun – Memory match
description:
While you speed up your memory with this minigame, you are helping us to continue producing more episodes of the
Maya & Baktun Adventures.
The game contains the characters and landscapes from the short film La Herencia, which shows images inspired by the landscapes of
Guatemala and you will also be able to watch the game in Spanish, English and Kaqkchiquel.
To keep you informed of upcoming games and episodes,
